snippet: A day after a report that DNA evidence may have been mishandled in 800 rape cases, the City Council announced it would hold an emergency hearing to look into the problem.
abstract: A day after a report that DNA evidence may have been mishandled in 800 rape cases, the City Council announced it would hold an emergency hearing to look into the problem.

headline.main: City Council to Examine Possible Mishandling of Rape Cases
